alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Russell County through 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ladonia, or 8 miles southwest of Smiths, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russell County Sports Complex, Ladonia, Phenix Drag Strip and Parkmanville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
